attributes.action: Introduce UK laws aligned with the EU Tax Avoidance Directive
attributes.additional_details: This will be a demonstration of the effectiveness of British sovereignty supported by leave-supporters, and a reassurance to remain-supporters who are concerned the UK will become a tax haven. It will be a step towards reconciling the country as it shows how British independence of the EU can be used for the good of the general population.
attributes.background: Leaders are keen to reconcile the national divisions created by Brexit. We ask the UK Government to introduce UK laws aligned with the EU Tax Avoidance Directive as a demonstration of the effectiveness of British sovereignty.

rejection.details:
The Government has already implemented the EU Anti-Tax Avoidance Directive: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/controlled-foreign-companies-and-eu-anti-tax-avoidance-directive/controlled-foreign-companies-and-eu-anti-tax-avoidance-directive

If you want the Government to maintain alignment to EU tax avoidance rules in the future, we could accept a petition requesting that.
